message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this incredible product. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll get a great value out of it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $8500?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I can offer you a price of $9000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $8500. I'd like to make a compromise at $8200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
